info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:18PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN INDIANA AND CENTRAL WESTMORELAND COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 418 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Greensburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Jeannette, Latrobe, McChesneytown-Loyalhanna, Blairsville, Derry, Lawson Heights, Ligonier, Black Lick, New Florence, New Alexandria, Seward, Bolivar, Youngstown, Armagh, Grapeville, Crabtree, Brush Vly, and Loyalhanna Gorge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
